title: What the Truckers Do and Do Not Want
description:
In this video, Benjamin Dichter, who is integrally involved in the Truckers Freedom Convoy, reads a statement of the movement's demands, who they are, and addresses what they are not asking for that has been presented by the legacy media. Full interview with Mikhaila and BJ available at: https://youtu.be/kwtgc2fsw2A

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BJdichter
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tamara_MVC
Freedom Convoy GiveSendGo: https://www.givesendgo.com/FreedomConvoy2022
Locals: https://freedomconvoy.locals.com
Bitcoin Drive: https://tallyco.in/honkhonkhodl/
B.J. Dichter's podcasts: http://www.possiblycorrect.com

the freedom convoy is a peaceful and
loving loving demonstration based on the

simple demands
one
the government and all covet mandates

we are not a group interested in

we are in fact open to all people who

the freedom convoy leadership spans the

indigenous

all who have an ambition for unification

our demands have not changed from day
one
and the mandates and end the passports
and we'll all go back home to our

there have been many demands attributed

we do not want to overthrow the

we do not want to confront we do not

we do not wish for military action
we want nothing other than for our

as well as our community outreach to

to have a voice and to appreciate the

to have
and which many others in the world

we also would ask that our political
class and the legacy media tone down

the era of slander and indiscriminately

respect one another but we cannot
achieve this if our political political
class
continues to behave
in such an unparliamentary manner while

the unifying goal that all canadians

a free life
no matter where one lies on the

now is the time
and the first courageous step would be

and data tracking of our citizens
allow us all to heal together
peace love and unity is the future of

that's all
